# rlevante

LEVANTE R package

## Installation

`devtools::install_git(url="https://github.com/levante-framework/rlevante")`

# Package index

## All functions

- [`get_participants()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_participants.md)
  : Get participants
- [`get_raw_table()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_raw_table.md)
  : Get raw table
- [`get_scores()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_scores.md)
  : Get scores
- [`get_surveys()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_surveys.md)
  : Get surveys
- [`get_trials()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_trials.md)
  : Get trials
